card.name: Inspired by Annihilation
card.text: Protection from custom. When Inspired by Annihilation attacks, each opponent sacrifices a custom nonland permanent. Remove 3 inspiration counters from this card: Exile target custom nonland permanent.

card.name: Inspired by Nullity
card.text: Whenever a custom spell is cast, put an inspiration counter on this card. {t}: add {c}. If 7 or more inspiration counters are on this card, transform this card.

card.name: Inspired by Inspiration
card.text: Eminence - Whenever a custom permanent you don't control enters the battlefield, It enters with an inspiration counter. If 5 different permanents with inspiration counters are on the battlefield, transform this card.

card.name: Inspired by Creation
card.text: Protection from permanents and spells with inspiration counters on them. This card gains the abilities of all permanents with an inspiration counter on them. {2}: Place an inspiration counter on target spell or permanent.

card.name: Inspired by Creativity
card.text: Flash When Inspired by Creativity or a custom spell you don't control is cast, you may exile this card; copy target custom spell. You may choose new targets.

card.name: Inspired by Violence
card.text: Haste When Inspired by Violence or another custom creature attacks, you may exile this card. All opponents take doubled combat damage until the end of this turn.

card.name: Inspired by Decay
card.text: Deathtouch When Inspired by Decay or another custom creature dies, you may exile this card. Return target custom permanent from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Inspired by Martyrdom
card.text: Vigilance When Inspired by Heroism or another custom creature you don't control blocks, you may exile this card; Each player chooses a custom permanent. Destroy all other nonland permanents.

card.name: Power Word: Bear
card.text: {1}{g}: Create a 2/2 Bear creature token. You may activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Inspired by Perseverance
card.text: Reach When Inspired by Perseverance or a custom permanent you don't control enters the battlefield, you may exile this card; you and permanents you control gain protection from everything until your next turn.
